firstLine: This course is available for lunch, dinner
comboDescription: Experience the Quick Bites combo - a main dish, Loaded Fries, and a drink, crafted to satisfy your cravings with every delicious bite.

comboDetailsItems.name: Classic Cheeseburger
comboDetailsItems.description: Our juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce on a soft bun.

comboDetailsItems.name: Crispy Chicken Sandwich
comboDetailsItems.description: A crispy breaded chicken breast topped with lettuce, tomato, and mayo on a toasted bun.

comboDetailsItems.name: Loaded fries
comboDetailsItems.description: Crispy golden fries topped with melted cheese, bacon bits, and green onions.

firstLine: THIS COURSE IS AVAILABLE FOR BREAKFAST, LUNCH, DINNER
comboDescription: Savor freshness and flavor in every bite with our mouth-watering Fresh & Flavorful combo - a main, side salad, and drink crafted from locally-sourced ingredients.

comboDetailsItems.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
comboDetailsItems.description: Grilled chicken breast served on a bed of mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and sliced avocado, drizzled with a tangy vinaigrette dressing.

comboDetailsItems.name: Veggie Wrap
comboDetailsItems.description: A delightful wrap filled with fresh vegetables such as lettuce, bell peppers, carrots, and cucumbers, complemented by a zesty dressing.

comboDetailsItems.name: Fruit Cup
comboDetailsItems.description: A refreshing medley of seasonal fruits, including juicy watermelon, succulent pineapple, sweet strawberries, and tangy grapes.

firstLine: THIS COURSE IS AVAILABLE FOR LUNCH, DINNER
comboDescription: Get unbeatable value and taste with our Value Meals combo - featuring our most popular mains, paired with a side and drink, all at an affordable price.

comboDetailsItems.name: Cheesy Chicken Quesadilla Combo
comboDetailsItems.description: A satisfying combo featuring a cheesy chicken quesadilla served with a side of crisp tortilla chips and homemade salsa.

comboDetailsItems.name: Savory Beef Burrito
comboDetailsItems.description: A hearty beef burrito stuffed with seasoned ground beef, black beans, rice, and melted cheese, accompanied by a side of sour cream and salsa.

comboDetailsItems.name: Fish Taco Trio
comboDetailsItems.description: Three flavorful fish tacos filled with crispy battered fish, shredded lettuce, tangy slaw, and a drizzle of chipotle mayo, served with a side of seasoned fries.

firstLine: This Course is Available for lunch and dinner
comboDescription: Experience the ultimate Deluxe Combo - a main dish, a side, and a drink, crafted to satisfy your cravings.

comboDetailsItems.name: Signature Burger
comboDetailsItems.description: Our signature beef patty topped with special sauce, fresh lettuce, and cheddar cheese on a toasted bun.

comboDetailsItems.name: Garlic Parmesan Fries
comboDetailsItems.description: Crispy golden fries seasoned with garlic and parmesan, served with a side of ketchup.

comboDetailsItems.name: Choco Lava Cake
comboDetailsItems.description: Indulge in a warm and gooey chocolate lava cake, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

firstLine: This Course is Available for breakfast, lunch, and dinner
comboDescription: Make the healthy choice with our nutritious combo - a main, a fresh salad, and a detox drink.

comboDetailsItems.name: Grilled Salmon
comboDetailsItems.description: Succulent grilled salmon fillet served with steamed vegetables and a lemon herb dressing.

comboDetailsItems.name: Garden Salad
comboDetailsItems.description: A vibrant garden salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and balsamic vinaigrette.

comboDetailsItems.name: Detox Water
comboDetailsItems.description: Stay refreshed with our detox water infused with lemon and mint.

firstLine: This Course is Available for lunch and dinner
comboDescription: Treat your family to a feast with our Family Feast combo - featuring a variety of mains, sides, and drinks.

comboDetailsItems.name: BBQ Ribs Platter
comboDetailsItems.description: Savory BBQ ribs served with coleslaw, cornbread, and a side of BBQ sauce.

comboDetailsItems.name: Loaded Potato Skins
comboDetailsItems.description: Crispy potato skins loaded with cheese, bacon, and sour cream.

comboDetailsItems.name: Pitcher of Soda
comboDetailsItems.description: Quench your thirst with a pitcher of your favorite soda.
